    • Method Detail

      • progressProperty

        public static javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyDoubleProperty progressProperty()
        The progress property of the calculation process.
        Returns:
        progress The amount progress currently made.

      • calculateProjectInformation

        public static void calculateProjectInformation​(Project project,
                                               int amountSequences,
                                               boolean fast,
                                               int monteCarloRepeats)
        Calculates the project information: The best sequence, The time of this sequence, The probability of completing at different times, Sets the start time of each task for the gantt view, The recommended amount of employees.
        Parameters:
        project - The project you want to calculate and set values for
        amountSequences - The amount of sequences you want
        fast - Less accurate, but possibly faster

      • findRandomSequences

        private static java.lang.String[] findRandomSequences​(int amountSequences,
                                                      int numOfWorkGroups,
                                                      Project project,
                                                      boolean fast)
        Finds an array of random sequences in a project. If there's only 1 work group it just finds a random sequence As all sequences would take the same amount of time assuming they're legal
        Parameters:
        amountSequences - Amount of sequences wanted (max)
        numOfWorkGroups - Amount of work groups in the project (Slightly faster to just send the integer than getting it from project)
        project - The project we want to find random sequences for
        fast - Finds less sequences, which is faster, but less accurate (Only faster with relatively small projects)
        Returns:
        An array of strings with random sequences for the project, all legal

      • calculateLambdaForAllTasks

        private static void calculateLambdaForAllTasks​(Project project)
        Calculates the lambda value (And an optimized mu value) for each task in a given project Sets the tasks inverse gaussian parameters (mu and lambda)
        Parameters:
        project - The project with the tasks that will be calculated

      • estimateTimeForAllSequences

        private static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> estimateTimeForAllSequences​(int amountSequences,
                                                                            java.lang.String[] randomSequences,
                                                                            Project project,
                                                                            int monteCarloRepeats)
        Estimates the time for all sequences and returns a list of doubles. This makes it possible to find the best sequence as that is the one with the same index as the smallest time.
        Parameters:
        amountSequences - The amount of sequences to be tried
        randomSequences - The sequences to be tried
        project - The project with the sequences
        Returns:
        The list of estimated times

      • allLowestToSecondLowest

        public static void allLowestToSecondLowest​(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> list)
        Sets all the doubles in a list that has the same value as the smallest value to the first value that is higher than the smallest value - Also sorts the list from smallest to highest i.e. [1, 1, 1, 9, 5, 3] would become [3, 3, 3, 3, 5, 9]
        Parameters:
        list - The list in which to set the smallest values to the first value above

      • setStartTimesOfTasks

        private static void setStartTimesOfTasks​(Project project,
                                         int numOfWorkGroups)
        Sets the start times of tasks to an available time slot depending on amount of work groups and dependencies This is used to create a reasonable gantt view
        Parameters:
        project - The project in which the tasks exist
        numOfWorkGroups - The amount of work groups

      • optimizeWorkGroups

        private static RecommendedEmployees optimizeWorkGroups​(Project project,
                                                       int numOfWorkGroups)
        Finds the smallest amount of work groups needed to get within a margin of the estimated time of the calculated project. Finds the smallest amount of work groups to get the project under a certain time.

        I.e. The project takes 100 duration Finds the smallest amount of work groups needed to be below 110 duration Finds the smallest amount of work groups needed to be below 90 duration

        Parameters:
        project - The project to optimize number of work groups
        numOfWorkGroups - The number of work groups in the project
        Returns:
        Returns the recommended amount of employees and their estimated time

      • findLowUp

        private static int[] findLowUp​(int numOfWorkGroups)
        Finds lower bound of a number of work groups. Finds upper bound of a number of work groups. So the program doesn't calculate forever.
        Parameters:
        numOfWorkGroups - Amount of work groups currently in the project
        Returns:
        An array of integers, first one being the lower bound, second being the upper bound.

      • estimateWithDifferentAmountOfWorkGroups

        private static int estimateWithDifferentAmountOfWorkGroups​(int amountEmployees,
                                                           int numOfWorkGroups,
                                                           Project project,
                                                           RecommendedEmployees tempRecEmp)
        Estimates the time for a project to complete with the sequence found for the current amount of employees. This gives a guess at an optimal amount of employees.
        Parameters:
        amountEmployees - The amount of employees to guess with
        numOfWorkGroups - The amount of employees the project has at the start
        project - The project to calculate
        tempRecEmp - The result
        Returns:
        0 = Skip this one, 1 = Estimation is done, 2 = No need to guess under the current amount of employees

      • NotLegal

        private static boolean NotLegal​(Task task,
                                java.util.List<Task> alreadyStarted)
        Checks if the task currently being put into a schedule can legally be put in there.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to check if legal to put in.
        alreadyStarted - The list of tasks already in.
        Returns:
        A boolean | True = Not legal | False = Legal

      • findSmallestPossible

        private static int findSmallestPossible​(Task task,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> startTimes)
        Checks if the task is ready to be put in after the task that is done the fastest currently.
        Parameters:
        task - The task to check
        startTimes - The current startTimes available
        Returns:
        The index of the startTime to be placed in, -1 if illegal

      • estimateTime

        private static double estimateTime​(Project project,
                                   int monteCarloRepeats,
                                   boolean random,
                                   int index,
                                   boolean rec)
        The main estimateTime function used to estimate the time of a project
        Parameters:
        project - The project you want estimated.
        monteCarloRepeats - The amount of times you want it repeated.
        random - Is it a random sequence or not.
        index - The index of the possible loop this is called in (If no loop, send 0).
        rec - If it should use the recommended path or not.
        Returns:
        Returns the estimated time of the project
